name: Ed Sheeran
bio: Ed Sheeran is an English singer-songwriter known for his hit songs and acoustic performances.

name: The Weeknd
bio: The Weeknd is a Canadian singer, songwriter, and record producer known for his unique voice and hit singles.

name: Queen
bio: Queen is a British rock band formed in London in 1970, known for their eclectic style and influential music.

name: Michael Jackson
bio: Michael Jackson was an American singer, songwriter, and dancer, dubbed the 'King of Pop'.

name: Nirvana
bio: Nirvana was an American rock band formed in Aberdeen, Washington, in 1987, known for pioneering the grunge movement.
